# Introduction

2023-08-25 11:00:25

Missing data is potentially a major issue in the analysis of clinical trials. 

The state of the art method of analysis MMRM requires the assumption of MAR,
missing at random. In many cases this assumption is untenable. See e.g. 
@heddenComparisonMissingData2008
In those cases alternate approaches should be considered.
